page.title: 08SCHOOLS-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: In our area there are 4 schools. Our school, Dunton Green County Primary, has 3 classes,71 children,3 teachers. It has a large field and 2 play- grounds. Riverhead C.P.(infants only) has 6 classes, 199 children, 7 staff, a large field and a good playground. Chevening C. of E. junior and infants school has about 90 children, 4 staff and also good recreational facilities. Combe Bank School is an independent Roman Catholic School which has 230 senior girls in 12 classes with 35 teachers & 163 Junior girls in 9 classes with 15 teachers. This school is set in lovely surroundings of some 27 acres. Main out_of_school activities for all are sport,gym, country dance, music and crafts. Children in our assigned block have to travel anything up to about 18 miles for their secondary education.
